drizzle.translation[0].definitions[0].de: to let a liquid fall on food in a small stream or in small drops
drizzle.translation[0].definitions[0].ex: Drizzle the soy sauce over the chicken.
drizzle.translation[1].definitions[0].de: weather that is a combination of light rain and mist
drizzle.translation[1].definitions[0].ex: A light drizzle had started by the time we left.
